description: Albanese has urged against protests on Oct. 7, citing the date’s significance as the anniversary of the largest killing of Jewish people since Holocaust.

description: Amazon Web Services’ director of global artificial intelligence is encouraging Canada not to go it alone when it comes to regulating the technology.
